query

Tuple query(Template template)
            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Queries a tuple matching template template from the local knowledge repository. This is a blocking: the thread invoking this method is blocked until a matching tuple is found.

Parameters:
template - action template
Returns:
a matching tuple
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - when another thread interrupts current thread computation while action is under execution.
